types.section:
{{fr-adv|[[au]] [[jour]] [[d']][[aujourd'hui]]}}

# [[as of]] [[today]], as things currently stand; at the present time

====Usage notes====
* {{m|fr|au jour d'aujourd'hui}} is sometimes used instead of {{m|fr|aujourd'hui}} as ''aujourd'hui'' can mean "of our time", "of our era". The phrase is often criticised by usage commentators for being [[pleonastic]] as it literally means "on the day of on the day of today".
types.html:
au jour d'aujourd'hui

  1. as of today, as things currently stand; at the present time

Usage notes

[edit]
  • au jour d'aujourd'hui is sometimes used instead of aujourd'hui as aujourd'hui can mean "of our time", "of our era". The phrase is often criticised by usage commentators for being pleonastic as it literally means "on the day of on the day of today".
trans: as of today, as things currently stand

title: au jour d'aujourd'hui
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /o ʒuʁ d‿o.ʒuʁ.d‿ɥi/
